meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tiffany Wen Michael Schulson Andrew Goldfein Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #3988.

div.div:
2001 Holiday Kids Week game 3.
(Sarah: This is Sarah of the Clue Crew. Take a free trip to Sea World with us on Jeopardy!)

td.p: Tiffany Wen, a 12-year-old from Exton, Pennsylvania
Michael Schulson, a 12-year-old from Chattanooga, Tennessee
Andrew Goldfein, a 12-year-old from Lincolnwood, Illinois

tr.td: FILL IN THE BLANK STATE NICKNAMES
FLOWER POWER
WHEN YOU'RE AN ADULT
UNREAL ESTATE
YOUNG STARS
UNDER THE "C"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_5', 'clue_DJ_1_5_stuck', '(Michael: [He was very animated trying to recall the name with his hands on his chin, face and head in varying positions while also slouching] ...Um...)
(Alex: Anything, Michael?)
(Michael: No.)
(Alex: Who is [*]?)
(Michael: Oh, I knew that. [double fingers pointed at the side of his head.)

Marie Curie

Michael
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[Alex ended the reading of the clue with his Transylvanian accent.]
...
(Alex: [To Michael] Did he come up with a bat? Yes. Didn\'t have to say "vampire". What was the--whoa! Hello!)
[The audience gasps--huge reaction and applause.]
(Alex: Wow! What a game! What a finish!)
[Michael single and double arm pumps.]
AndrewWhat is the vampire bat
$7,599
TiffanyWhat is a vampire bat????????
$2,500
MichaelWhat is bat
$15,400
(vampire) bat')

tr.td: ANIMALS
Scientists named an anticoagulant found in the saliva of a species of this animal "draculin"
Andrew
Michael
Tiffany
3rd place: $1000 shopping spree at HPShopping.com & trip to Waikiki with stay at Hilton Hawaiian Village
Winner: $32,800 & trip to Waikiki with stay at Hilton Hawaiian Village
2nd place: $1000 shopping spree at HPShopping.com & trip to Waikiki with stay at Hilton Hawaiian Village
Andrew
Michael
Tiffany

11 R
(including 2 DDs),
4 W

24 R,
2 W
(including 1 DD)
